attributes.action: Without further delay allow Public Consultation on the Merger of DPP's + CSP's in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Government who, through the Northern Ireland Office, are refusing to consult with members of the public in Northern Ireland on the Merger of District Policing partnerships and Community safety Partnerships.


The Government has been engaged in a secret Consultation process thus far and refuses to engage with members of the public.


The question you have to ask is why are the Government afraid to engage and consult.


If the Government wants people to engage with the Police in Northern Ireland they'll have to address this situtation immediately.
